code:
%%{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> Created: Create Todo
    Created --> InProgress: Start Work
    Created --> Cancelled: Cancel
    InProgress --> OnHold: Pause
    InProgress --> Completed: Complete
    InProgress --> Cancelled: Cancel
    OnHold --> InProgress: Resume
    OnHold --> Cancelled: Cancel
    Completed --> [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    Cancelled --> [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

    state Created {IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker] --> Draft
        Draft --> ReadyToStart: Finalize
        ReadyToStart --> [IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    }

    state InProgress {IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> Started
        Started --> InReview: Submit for Review
        InReview --> Started: Request Changes
        InReview --> [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]: Approve
    }

    state OnHold {IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] --> Blocked
        [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> Deferred
        Blocked --> [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]: Unblock
        Deferred --> [IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]: Prioritize
    }

    state Completed {IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic] --> Done
        [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> PartiallyDone
        Done --> [IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        PartiallyDone --> [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    }
